snippet: Justice Maxwell Wiley had not allowed evidence about Pedro Hernandez’s drug use, later reversing the ruling.
abstract: Defense in trial of Pedro Hernandez, suspect in 1979 murder of Etan Patz, moves for mistrial following prosecution's questioning of Hernandez's cocaine use; Justice Maxwell Wiley denies motion.
lead_paragraph: Justice Maxwell Wiley had not allowed evidence about Pedro Hernandez’s drug use, later reversing the ruling.

headline.main: Patz Judge Denies Mistrial Request Over Suspect’s Drug Use
headline.print_headline: Patz Judge Denies Mistrial Request Over Suspect’s Drug Use
